overview:
As Senior Vice President of Network and Exchange at BrightRoll, Lewis is charged with broadening BrightRollâ€™s audience reach and enhancing client value by building strategic partnerships with the top companies in the IP video ecosystem. Prior to joining BrightRoll, Lewis was Head of Distribution for the National Broadband Company (NBBC), NBC Universalâ€™s digital video syndication business, where he was responsible for connecting premium digital video owners with the webâ€™s premier publishers.

Active in the digital media community for over a decade, Lewis spent five years at DoubleClickâ€™s TechSolutions for Publishers business, most recently as sales and account management leader. At LightningCast, one of the first video advertising companies, he was as director of sales for the video ad insertion technology business, where he helped ready the company for acquisition by AOL. In those capacities, he spearheaded technology and media solutions for numerous industry leaders, including AOL, Washington Post.Newsweek Interactive, Disney/ABC, Scripps Networks, MTV Networks, CBS Inc., Knight Ridder Digital, United Online, among many others.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President of Network Development
